name: Mask of the Rose Soundtrack
description:
The official soundtrack to Mask of the Rose, composed by Laurence Chapman.Credits Violins: Elaine Ambridge & Elise Harper
Violas: Jess Tickle & Jordan Bowron
Cello: Rachel Shakespeare
Clarinets: Tom Evans
Bassoon: Alice Braithwaite
Harp: Olivia Jageurs
Piano: Laurence Chapman
Recording Engineer: Richard Brooker

Score recorded at Brookspeare Music Studio

  3. [01:46] The Attic
  4. [04:50] The Landaus

  6. [03:48] A Change of Clothes
  7. [02:14] Imprisoned
  8. [03:42] Horatia
  9. [03:43] Griz's Theme
  10. [02:43] Journey to the Ministry
  11. [04:03] Archie's Theme
  12. [02:08] Menace Eradication
  13. [03:05] Harjit's Theme
  14. [03:42] The Drowned Parliament
  15. [03:55] Hogslain Market
  16. [03:03] Fantasia on Mask of the Rose
